briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Eptinezumab Administered Intravenously in Participants Experiencing Acute Attack of Migraine
officialTitle: A Parallel Group, Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Eptinezumab Administered Intravenously in Subjects Experiencing an Acute Attack of Migraine
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of eptinezumab administered intravenously in participants experiencing an acute attack of migraine.
